Module fypmsV2

Package handlers

package handlers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApproveRequestHandler
    A handler that approves a request.
    GetProjectHandler
    A handler that retrieves a project by ID.
    GetStudentHandler
    A handler that retrieves a student by ID.
    GetSupervisorHandler
    A handler that retrieves a supervisor by ID.
    Handler
    An abstract class that defines a request handler.
    RejectRequestHandler
    A handler that rejects a request.
    SupervisorAvailableHandler
    A handler responsible for checking if a supervisor is available to take on a request.
    UpdateProjectHandler
    A handler for handling various types of project update requests.
    UpdateProjectRejectHandler
    A handler responsible for handling ProjectRequests that have been rejected and updating the status of the associated project accordingly.
    UpdateStudentHandler
    A handler to update the student object associated with a request.
    UpdateSupervisorProjectsHandler
    This class handles the updating of project and supervisor data when a student registers or deregisters from a project, or a supervisor transfers from a project
